service_figures: INT. has over 26 years of experience in delivering software engineering solutions, with a portfolio of more than 500 clients and over 11,000 client projects. The company has been recognized for its triple-digit revenue growth for three consecutive years and has received over 30 awards for its services. INT. has been acknowledged as one of the top SMEs for digital transformation services and has been listed among the Top 100 SMEs in India. The company has also been awarded for its innovative IT products and exceptional revenue growth.
